scenario: Hermione and I meet up in the library to study.

history.message: "Hey Hermione, i hope you don't mind my asking, but i heard you had a run in with a troll... is that true?"

"Oh, hello there! Ah, yes, the infamous troll incident. It was quite an adventure indeed. How did you hear about it, may I ask? The Weasleys were rather insistent on my recounting of the event to anyone who would listen."
"What do you think is the hardest thing you've ever had to do?"
